name: Testhouse Ltd
tagline: Software Testing, QA and DevOps Company
description:
Testhouse is a global leader in Software Quality Management, Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) and DevOps providing onsite, onshore and offshore functional and non-functional test services since 2000. Our offering includes outsourced and on-demand expertise in strategic consulting, software testing, training, and managed services. 
Testhouse is specialized in Microsoft Dynamics CRM and AX practice with automated build and deployment solutions, with over 5,000 manual and automated test scripts readily available, Coded UI and Selenium Frameworks to ease creation and maintenance of automated scripts. 
The global expertise of Testhouse’s staff, our innovations, and strong global partner ecosystem, which includes Microsoft, IBM, and HP provide the expertise and solutions to enable organizations to accelerate software delivery at the optimal quality in the most cost-effective way to meet their business priorities and clients’ needs.
